segments.text: What are you doing to your house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to do to it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , we're going to change the curtains , then we're going to paint the walls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What colour are you going to paint them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What else are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to put in some new furniture .
segments.speaker: S2
